name: Graveyard Scavenger
description:
Graveyard scavenger is a 2D pixel art game where the player must search and find the weapons of ancient heroes and warriors from the past.

Controls:

  • Move with ASDW
  • Attack with space or with right click
  • Switch weapon with Q

You have limited arrows, you can get more by taking them from the ground or deflected them with your sword.
